Verses: 1  andriyum, Sagodharare, Naan Ungalukkup Pirasangiththa Suviseshaththai Marupadiyum Ungalukkuth Theriyappaduththugiren; Neengalum Adhai Etrukkondu, Adhile Nilaiththirukkireergal
2  naan Ungalukkup Pirasangiththapiragaaramaai, Neengal Adhaik Kaikkondirundhaal, Adhinaale Neengal Iratchikkappaduveergal; Matrappadi Ungal Visuvaasam Virudhaavaayirukkume.
3  naan Adaindhadhum Ungalukkup Piradhaanamaaga Oppuviththadhum Ennavendraal, Kiristhuvaanavar Vedhavaakkiyangalinpadi Namadhu Paavangalukkaaga Mariththu,
4  adakkampannappattu, Vedhavaakkiyangalinpadi Moondraam Naalil Uyirththezhundhu,
5  kebaavukkum, Pinbu Panniruvarukkum Tharisanamaanaar.
6  adhanpinbu Avar Ainnooruperukku Adhigamaana Sagodhararukkum Orevelaiyil Tharisanamaanaar; Avargalil Anegar Innaalvaraikkum Irukkiraargal, Silar Maaththiram Niththiraiyadaindhaargal.
7  pinbu Yaakkobukkum, Adhanpinbu Apposthalarellaarukkum Tharisanamaanaar.
8  ellaarukkum Pinbu, Agaalappiravipondra Enakkum Tharisanamaanaar.
9  naan Apposthalarellaarilum Siriyavanaayirukkiren; Dhevanudaiya Sabaiyaith Thunpappaduththinadhinaale, Naan Apposthalanendru Perperuvadharkum Paaththiran Alla.

10  aagilum Naan Irukkiradhu Devakirubaiyinaale Irukkiren; Avar Enakku Aruliya Kirubai Virudhaavaayirukkavillai; Avargalellaarilum Naan Adhigamaaip Pirayaasappatten, Aagilum Naan Alla, Ennudane Irukkira Devakirubaiye Appadi Seydhadhu.
11  aagaiyaal Naanaagilum Avargalaagilum Ippadiye Pirasangiththu Varugirom, Neengalum Ippadiye Visuvaasiththirukkireergal.
12  kiristhu Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhaarendru Pirasangikkappattirukka, Mariththorin Uyirththezhudhalillaiyendru Ungalil Silar Eppadi Sollalaam?
13  mariththorin Uyirththezhudhal Illaavittaal Kiristhuvum Ezhundhirukkavillaiye.
14  kiristhu Ezhundhirukkavillaiyendraal, Engal Pirasangamum Virudhaa, Ungal Visuvaasamum Virudhaa.

15  mariththor Uyirththezhaavittaal, Dhevan Ezhuppaadha Kiristhuvai Avar Ezhuppinaarendru Naangal Dhevanaikkuriththu Saatchisonnadhinaale, Dhevanukkaagap Poisaatchi Sollugiravargalaagavum Kaanappaduvome.
16  mariththor Uyirththezhaavittaal, Kiristhuvum Ezhundhirukkavillai.
17  kiristhu Ezhundhiraavittaal, Ungal Visuvaasam Veenaayirukkum; Neengal Innum Ungal Paavangalil Iruppeergal.
18  kiristhuvukkul Niththiraiyadaindhavargalum Kettiruppaargale.
19  immaikkaagamaaththiram Naam Kiristhuvinmel Nambikkaiyullavargalaayirundhaal, Ellaa Manusharaippaarkkilum Paridhabikkappadaththakkavargalaayiruppom.
20  kiristhuvo Mariththorilirundhu, Niththiraiyadaindhavargalil Mudharpalanaanaar.
21  manushanaal Maranam Undaanapadiyaal, Manushanaal Mariththorin Uyirththezhudhalum Undaayitru.
22  aadhaamukkul Ellaarum Marikkiradhupola, Kiristhuvukkul Ellaarum Uyirppikkappaduvaargal.
23  avanavan Thanthan Varisaiyile Uyirppikkappaduvaan, Mudharpalanaanavar Kiristhu; Pinbu Avar Varugaiyil Avarudaiyavargal Uyirppikkappaduvaargal.
24  adhanpinbu Mudivu Undaagum; Appozhudhu Avar Sagala Thuraiththanaththaiyum Sagala Adhikaaraththaiyum Vallamaiyaiyum Parigariththu, Dhevanum Pidhaavumaayirukkiravarukku Raajyaththai Oppukkoduppaar.
25  ellaa Saththurukkalaiyum Thamadhu Paadhaththirkuk Keezhaakkippodumvaraikkum, Avar Aalugaiseyyavendiyadhu.
26  parigarikkappadung Kadaisi Saththuru Maranam.

27  sagalaththaiyum Avarudaiya Paadhaththirkuk Keezhppaduththinaare; Aagilum Sagalamum Avarukkuk Keezhppaduththappattadhendru Solliyirukkum Podhu, Sagalaththaiyum Avarukkuk Keezhppaduththinavar Keezhppaduththappadavillaiyenpadhu Veliyarangamaayirukkiradhu.
28  sagalamum Avarukkuk Keezhppattirukkumpodhu, Dhevane Sagalaththilum Sagalamumaayiruppadharku, Kumaaran Thaamum Thamakkuch Sagalaththaiyum Keezhppaduththinavarukkuk Keezhppattiruppaar.
29  melum Mariththor Uyirththezhaavittaal, Mariththavargalukkaaga Gnaanasnaanam Perugiravargal Enna Seyvaargal? Mariththavargalukkaaga En Gnaanasnaanam Perugiraargal?
30  naangalum En Enneramum Naasamosaththirku Edhuvaayirukkirom?
31  naan Anudhinamum Saagiren; Adhai Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Kiristhu Yesuvinaal Ungalaikkuriththu Naan Paaraattugira Menmaiyaikkondu Saththiyamaai Sollugiren.

32  naan Ebesuvile Thushtamirugangaludane Poraadinenendru Manusharvazhakkamaai Sollugiren; Appadip Poraadinadhinaale Enakkup Pirayojanamenna? Mariththor Uyirththezhaavittaal, Pusippom Kudippom, Naalaikku Saavom Endru Sollalaame?
33  mosampogaadhirungal; Aagaadha Sambaashanaigal Nallozhukkangalaik Kedukkum.
34  neengal Paavanjeyyaamal Neethikkerga Vizhiththukkondu, Thelindhavargalaayirungal; Silar Dhevanaippatri Arivillaadhirukkiraargale; Ungalukku Vetkamundaaga Idhai Sollugiren.
35  aagilum, Mariththor Eppadi Ezhundhiruppaargal, Eppadippatta Sareeraththode Varuvaargalendru Oruvan Solvaanaagil,
36  puththiyeenane, Nee Vidhaikkira Vidhai Seththaalozhiya Uyirkkamaattaadhe.
37  nee Vidhaikkirapodhu, Ini Undaagum Meniyai Vidhaiyaamal, Kodhumai, Alladhu Matroru Thaaniyaththinudaiya Verum Vidhaiyaiye Vidhaikkiraai.
38  adharku Dhevan Thamadhu Siththaththinpadiye Meniyaik Kodukkiraar; Vidhai Vagaigal Ovvondrirkum Adhadharketra Meniyaiye Kodukkiraar
39  ellaa Maamsamum Orevidhamaana Maamsamalla; Manusharudaiya Maamsam Vere, Mirugangaludaiya Maamsam Vere, Machchangaludaiya Maamsam Vere, Paravaigaludaiya Maamsam Vere.
40  vaanaththukkuriya Menigalumundu, Boomikkuriya Menigalumundu; Vaanaththukkuriya Menigaludaiya Magimaiyum Vere, Boomikkuriya Menigaludaiya Magimaiyum Vere;
41  sooriyanudaiya Magimaiyum Vere, Sandhiranudaiya Magimaiyum Vere, Natchaththirangaludaiya Magimaiyum Vere, Magimaiyile Natchaththiraththukku Natchaththiram Viseshiththirukkiradhu.
42  mariththorin Uyirththezhudhalum Appadiye Irukkum. Azhivulladhaai Vidhaikkappadum, Azhivillaadhadhaai Ezhundhirukkum;
43  kanaveenamulladhaai Vidhaikkappadum, Magimaiyulladhaai Ezhundhirukkum; Balaveenamulladhaai Vidhaikkappadum, Balamulladhaai Ezhundhirukkum.
44  jenma Sareeram Vidhaikkappadum, Aavikkuriya Sareeram Ezhundhirukkum; Jenma Sareeramumundu, Aavikkuriya Sareeramumundu.
45  andhappadiye Mundhina Manushanaagiya Aadhaam Jeevaaththumaavaanaan Endrezhudhiyirukkiradhu, Pindhina Aadhaam Uyirppikkira Aaviyaanaar.
46  aagilum Aavikkuriya Sareeram Mundhinadhalla, Jenmasareerame Mundhinadhu; Aavikkuriya Sareeram Pindhinadhu.
47  mundhina Manushan Boomiyilirundhundaana Mannaanavan; Irandaam Manushan Vaanaththilirundhu Vandha Karththar.
48  mannaanavan Eppadippattavano Mannaanavargalum Appadippattavargale; Vaanaththukkuriyavar Eppadippattavaro, Vaanaththukkuriyavargalum Appadippattavargale.
49  melum Mannaanavanudaiya Saayalai Naam Anindhirukkiradhupola, Vaanavarudaiya Saayalaiyum Anindhukolvom.
50  sagodharare, Naan Sollugiradhennavenil, Maamsamum Iraththamum Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththai Sudhandharikkamaattaadhu; Azhivulladhu Azhiyaamaiyai Sudhandharippadhumillai.

51  idho, Oru Iragasiyaththai Ungalukku Arivikkiren; Naamellaarum Niththiraiyadaivadhillai; Aagilum Kadaisi Ekkaalam Thonikkumpodhu, Oru Nimishaththile, Oru Imaippozhudhile, Naamellaarum Maruroobamaakkappaduvom.
52  ekkaalam Thonikkum, Appozhudhu Mariththor Azhivillaadhavargalaai Ezhundhiruppaargal; Naamum Maruroobamaakkappaduvom.
53  azhivulladhaagiya Idhu Azhiyaamaiyaiyum, Saavukkedhuvaagiya Idhu Saavaamaiyaiyum Thariththukkollavendum.
54  azhivulladhaagiya Idhu Azhiyaamaiyaiyum, Saavukkedhuvaagiya Idhu Saavaamaiyaiyum Thariththukkollumpodhu, Maranam Jeyamaaga Vizhungappattadhu Endru Ezhudhiyirukkira Vaarththai Niraiverum.
55  maraname! Un Koor Enge? Paadhaalame! Un Jeyam Enge?
56  maranaththin Koor Paavam, Paavaththin Belan Niyaayappiramaanam.
57  nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaale Namakku Jeyangodukkira Dhevanukku Sthoththiram.

58  aagaiyaal, Enakkup Piriyamaana Sagodharare, Karththarukkul Neengal Padugira Pirayaasam Virudhaavaayiraadhendru Arindhu, Neengal Urudhippattavargalaayum, Asaiyaadhavargalaayum,karththarudaiya Kiriyaiyile Eppozhudhum Perugukiravargalaayum Iruppeergalaaga.
